[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Require {
            require: Span {
                line: 3,
                column: 1,
                position: 7,
            },
            path: Concat {
                left: MagicConstant(
                    Directory(
                        Span {
                            line: 3,
                            column: 9,
                            position: 15,
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                dot: Span {
                    line: 3,
                    column: 17,
                    position: 23,
                },
                right: Literal(
                    String(
                        LiteralString {
                            value: "'/foo.php'",
                            span: Span {
                                line: 3,
                                column: 19,
                                position: 25,
                            },
                        },
                    ),
                ),
            },
        },
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span {
                line: 3,
                column: 29,
                position: 35,
            },
        ),
    },
]
